cosmopolitan noun [C]
(DRINK)
(also Cosmopolitan) a red alcoholic drink made by mixing together vodka, triple sec (= an alcoholic drink made with oranges), cranberry juice and lime juice: We ordered mint mojitos, cosmopolitans, and martinis. You can spend a few hours sipping Cosmopolitans at the hotel's luxurious bar.
